Description: AWS CloudFormation Template for running Rails APP

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

ImageId.Description: Base Image ID of the OS Selection

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

SSHLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used to SSH to the EC2 instances
SSHLocation.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash -xe
# Logging all the commands execution 
exec > /tmp/part-001.log 2>&1 
#always update the system packages 
sudo apt-get update -y 
# install supported packages for ruby and git 
sudo apt-get install git-core curl zlib1g-dev build-essential libssl-dev libreadline-dev libyaml-dev libsqlite3-dev sqlite3 libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev python-software-properties libffi-dev -y
#install ruby environment as prereq for the application 
sudo apt-get install rbenv -y 
#install the bundler for as prereq to run the application as bundle package 
sudo gem install bundler 
cd /home/ubuntu 
# clone or checkout the application for deployment 
git clone https://github.com/rea-cruitment/simple-sinatra-app.git 
cd /home/ubuntu/simple-sinatra-app 
bundle install 
# Run the application on the host ip and port 80 to be available 
bundle exec rackup --host $(hostname -i) -p 80 &

InstanceId.Description: InstanceId of the newly created EC2 instance

AZ.Description: Availability Zone of the newly created EC2 instance

PublicDNS.Description: Public DNSName of the newly created EC2 instance

PublicIP.Description: Public IP address of the newly created EC2 instance
